title: REACH OUT 4 UPDATED PRICING || Huge Patio / Balcony, Gorgeous Location
posting_body: Enjoy The Good Life...
Welcome Home!
Seize your chance to live in The Irvington, one of the most iconic apartment communities in Portland, OR.
The Irvington
show contact info
1532 NE 21st Avenue
Portland OR 97232
Bed: 1
Bath: 1
Rent: 1399
Your home is your castle and a place to unwind and relax.
The Irvington offers something for everyone.
See our available amenities to find something that speaks to you.
Get a sneak peek of the good life here at The Irvington.
At The Irvington, we get that life can sometimes get hectic, busy, or just downright stressful.
Our community offers you the very best of the city from the peaceful confines of the historic Irvington and Sullivan’s Gulch neighborhoods.
Live next-door to the heart of Portland’s hustle and bustle!
We offer our residents a myriad of top-notch amenities to make life that much easier so that you have more time to kick back.
Our Amenities
Maple Soft-Close Cabinets
FREE Bike Storage
Private Deck / Patio with Living Room and Bedroom Access
Walk Score 89, Bike Score 100
Elevator Access to Floors 2-6
New Carpet in the Bedroom
All New Brushed Nickel Lighting, Fixtures, and Hardware
Alarm System
Floor to Ceiling Windows
Convenient Laundry Facility in Building
Full Tub/Shower, Lighted Mirror w/ LED lighting
Cat-friendly
Sliding Glass Patio Doors*
Professionally Managed by Princeton Property Management
The Irvington provides residents with roomy one-bedroom apartment floor plans with modern design and filled with closets, so you can find the home that fits your lifestyle for years to come.
If you just need to get away and enjoy the city’s offerings, explore all of the shopping, dining, and entertainment that nearby downtown Portland has to offer!
Our Walk Score of 87 makes us as a “Very Walkable” location and our Bike Score of 100 makes us a “Biker’s Paradise”.
Rest assured, you can explore the area and nearby Portland with or without a car.
With easy access to I-84 and I-5, The Irvington is just minutes away from Downtown Portland and The Pearl District.
Got some downtime and need to unwind?
If you want somewhere serene to clear your head, you need look no further than our smoke-free community with long private balconies, gated off-street parking, free bike storage, and parcel lockers.
